mapper.select: /*ajax 호출*/ select * from goods_info where goods_info_code = #{code}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods_info SET arrival = "y" , arrival_date = curdate() WHERE buy_order_code = #{check};
mapper.select: /*오류 입고 리스트*/ SELECT * FROM goods_info AS g INNER JOIN delivery_current_state AS d on g.goods_info_code = d.goods_info_code WHERE d.stat_info = "오류입고"
/*창고 도착 리스트*/ SELECT * FROM goods_info AS g inner JOIN delivery_current_state AS d ON g.goods_info_code = d.goods_info_code WHERE d.stat_info ="입고 대기" AND g.arrival = 'y'
/*입고 등록 전 리스트*/ SELECT * FROM goods_info AS g inner JOIN delivery_current_state AS d ON g.goods_info_code = d.goods_info_code WHERE d.stat_info ="입고 대기" AND g.arrival = 'y'
/*입고전 상품 리스트 게시물 전체 개수*/ select count(*) from goods_info as g inner join order_info as o on g.buy_order_code = o.buy_order_code where g.buy_order_code = #{buyOrderCode} and o.step3 = 'y';
select * from goods_info as g inner join order_info as o on g.buy_order_code = o.buy_order_code where g.buy_order_code = #{buyOrderCode} and o.step3 = 'y' limit ${cri.skip}, ${cri.amount}

/*입고 등록 시 특정 상품코드 조회*/ SELECT g.buy_order_code AS buyOrderCode ,g.goods_info_code AS goodsInfoCode ,g.likey_pass AS likeyPass FROM goods_info AS g inner JOIN delivery_current_state AS d ON g.goods_info_code = d.goods_info_code WHERE d.stat_info ='입고 대기' AND g.arrival = 'y' AND g.goods_info_code = #{goodsInfoCode};
